com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum BleTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BleTask>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<BleTask>

    public enum BleTask
extends Enum<BleTask>
    Under the hood, SweetBlue uses a priority task queue to serialize all interaction with the native BLE stack. This enumeration represents all the tasks that are used and lets you control various timing options in BleDeviceConfig and BleManagerConfig, for example BleNodeConfig.taskTimeoutRequestFilter.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ADD_SERVICE
      Associated with BleServer.addService(BleService, BleServer.ServiceAddListener) or overloads.
      BOND
      Associated with BleDevice.bond() and BleDeviceState.BONDING.
      CONNECT
      Associated with BleDevice.connect() and its several overloads.
      CONNECT_SERVER
      Associated with BleServer.connect(String) or overloads.
      DISCONNECT
      Associated with BleDevice.disconnect().
      DISCONNECT_SERVER
      Associated with BleServer.disconnect(String).
      DISCOVER_SERVICES
      Associated with discovering services after a BleDevice becomes BleDeviceState.CONNECTED.
      READ
      Associated with BleDevice.read(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ReadWriteListener).
      READ_RSSI
      Associated with BleDevice.readRssi() and BleDevice.startRssiPoll(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.Interval) (and overloads thereof).
      RESOLVE_CRASHES
      Associated with BleManagerConfig.enableCrashResolver.
      SEND_NOTIFICATION
      Associated with sending a notification to a remote client through BleServer.sendNotification(String, UUID, UUID, FutureData, BleServer.OutgoingListener) or BleServer.sendIndication(String, UUID, UUID, FutureData, BleServer.OutgoingListener) overloads.
      SEND_READ_WRITE_RESPONSE
      Associated with BleServer.IncomingListener.Please.respondWithSuccess(), BleServer.IncomingListener.Please.respondWithError(int), or various other static methods of BleServer.IncomingListener.Please.
      SET_MTU
      Associated with BleDevice.setMtu(int) or overloads.
      TOGGLE_NOTIFY
      Associated with BleDevice.enableNotify(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ReadWriteListener) and BleDevice.disableNotify(java.util.UUID, com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ReadWriteListener).
      TURN_BLE_OFF
      Associated with BleManager.turnOff()
      TURN_BLE_ON
      Associated with BleManager.turnOn()
      UNBOND
      Associated with BleDevice.unbond().
      WRITE
      Associated with BleDevice.write(java.util.UUID, byte[], com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleDevice.ReadWriteListener).
